description:
stack@s2600wt:~/devstack$ openstack flavor create --vcpus 6  --ram 6144 --disk 40 --property hw:numa_nodes=2  --property hw:numa_cpus.0=0,1 --property hw:numa_mem.0=2048 --p│·····
roperty hw:numa_cpus.1=2,3,4,5 --property hw:numa_mem.1=4096  --property hw:cpu_policy=shared --property hw:cpu_thread_policy=require test_numa_with_shared_thread_require   │·····WARNING: openstackclient.common.utils is deprecated and will be removed after Jun 2017. Please use osc_lib.utils                                                             │·····+----------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+│·····
| Field                      | Value                                                                                                                                        |│·····
+----------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+│·····
| OS-FLV-DISABLED:disabled   | False                                                                                                                                        |│·····
| OS-FLV-EXT-DATA:ephemeral  | 0                                                                                                                                            |│·····
| disk                       | 40                                                                                                                                           |│·····
| id                         | 94b49753-abad-4753-b0df-1699da04baa4                                                                                                         |│·····
| name                       | test_numa_with_shared_thread_require                                                                                                         |│·····
| os-flavor-access:is_public | True                                                                                                                                         |│·····
| properties                 | hw:cpu_policy='shared', hw:cpu_thread_policy='require', hw:numa_cpus.0='0,1', hw:numa_cpus.1='2,3,4,5', hw:numa_mem.0='2048',                |│·····
|                            | hw:numa_mem.1='4096', hw:numa_nodes='2'                                                                                                      |│·····
| ram                        | 6144                                                                                                                                         |│·····
| rxtx_factor                | 1.0                                                                                                                                          |│·····
| swap                       |                                                                                                                                              |│·····
| vcpus                      | 6                                                                                                                                            |│·····
+----------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

<class 'nova.exception.CPUThreadPolicyConfigurationInvalid'> (HTTP 500) (Request-ID: req-5f0efa65-6545-45d1-b499-a48817720f44)

title: 500 error while create instance with numa flavor setting

comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~taget-9

comments.content: Could not able to reproduce it?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~shashi-kant

comments.content: As I understand you cant use hw:cpu_policy=shared and hw:cpu_thread_policy=require in one flavor
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~snikitin

comments.content:
what I am thinking is not only document this in manual or docs

we should:

1 disallow this when define a flavor 
or 
2 raise bad request if create an instance with not supported flavor
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~taget-9

comments.content:
After some digging I found out that we have 7 exceptions which wouldn't be caught in create server method (https://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/+bug/1636911). One of them is 'CPUThreadPolicyConfigurationInvalid' which is presented in this bug. 
So we must catch these exceptions and raise 400 Bad Request. 

Also I found out that that conflict case with hw:cpu_policy=shared and hw:cpu_thread_policy=require in one flavor was already described in NUMA pinning spec: "The threads policy will control how the scheduler / virt driver place guests wrt CPU threads. It will only apply if the sheduler policy is ‘dedicated’"

https://specs.openstack.org/openstack/nova-specs/specs/juno/approved/virt-driver-cpu-pinning.html
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~snikitin

comments.content: This patch will fix the problem https://review.openstack.org/#/c/390919
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~snikitin

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/390919
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=d32d8c0ee1dbbdcc161bf6a7fcee3c5209be6e18
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit d32d8c0ee1dbbdcc161bf6a7fcee3c5209be6e18
Author: Sergey Nikitin <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Oct 26 18:56:30 2016 +0300

    Catch NUMA related exceptions in create server API method
    
    The exceptions are raised by numa_get_constraints() method should be
    caught by REST API layer explicitly. If we wouldn't catch them
    nova will return responce with 500 status code instead of 400.
    
    Following exceptions were caught:
    
     * CPUThreadPolicyConfigurationInvalid
     * ImageCPUPinningForbidden
     * ImageCPUThreadPolicyForbidden
     * MemoryPageSizeInvalid
     * MemoryPageSizeForbidden
     * RealtimeConfigurationInvalid
     * RealtimeMaskNotFoundOrInvalid
    
    Closes-Bug: #1636911
    Closes-Bug: #1636688
    
    Change-Id: I7c06bb2c3094eee403e615d6027c38502eaabd49
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: This issue was fixed in the openstack/nova 15.0.0.0b3 development milestone.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
